data.text: Replicate your changes whatever you want and wherever you want
Save your block changes to some node, and then share your changes with the query parameter ?u=url.

data.code:
editor.blocks.get$.pipe(
  first(),
  map(x => x.map(y => y.index+" "+y.id+" "+y.type)),
  display
)
